item.title: Is Government Surveillance necessary for national security?
item.description: Contents Opening statement Arguement Closing statement References Opening statement National security is an important concept that applies to every individual in our current societal infrastructures. Our confidence in our government can become compromised if our security is breached and we do not discover threats before they are enacted.
